entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 10:48 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:48 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then periods of light snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 10:48 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023
